text: Updated 2025 Quinteros Immunization Simulation Parent Content Review the following prior to your immunization simulation: • Immunizations: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/imz-schedules/child- adolescent-age.html • Hepatitis B: https://www.cdc.gov/hepatitis-b/about/index.html VIS: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/vis/vis-statements/hep-b.html • Hib: https://www.cdc.gov/hi-disease/vaccines/index.html VIS: https://www.cdc.gov/vaccines/hcp/vis/vis-statements/hib.html • Review and be familiar with the client’s chart in ChartFlow. • Complete the Pediatric Immunization worksheet and Immunization Parent Pre- Simulation Assignment (watch video) and submit it via Dropbox on D2L by 7:00 am the morning of your scheduled immunization simulation. The following should be completed after you have completed your immunization simulation: • Parent Self Reflection Assignment submit via Dropbox on D2L • Immunization quiz on D2L These are due by 7:00 pm on the day of your scheduled immunization simulation.
